Giada De Laurentiis' Plans for a National Pasta Chain Has Our Mouths Watering

Nothing warms your heart quite like comfort food and Giada De Laurentiis insists that Italians make the best comfort food possible.The talented chef and television personality has been…Source: Giada De Laurentiis' Plans for a National Pasta Chain Has Our Mouths Watering
